label: viewModel
description: Bindable logic and statefulness for your markup.

label: Components
description: Modularize and encapsulate sections of your application. Create different views it can use.

label: Routing
description: Swap out views and manage user state in your application.

label: Namespacing
description: Communicate to/from, send/receive commands, and trigger events between differing areas of your application.

label: Broadcastable / Receivable
description: Share/propogate information and state automatically between different areas of your code.
